user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Secure Authentication and Access Management
epics.summary: Implement secure multi-factor authentication and account access controls.
epics.description: Develop and integrate a secure multi-factor authentication system that enables customers to log in safely to the self-service portal. Include factors like OTP, authentication apps, or email verification. Implement secure password policies, session timeout mechanisms, and data encryption to safeguard customer credentials and prevent unauthorized access.

epics.title: Personalized Banking Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a customized user dashboard showcasing relevant banking products and information.
epics.description: Design and implement a dynamic dashboard that displays customer-specific banking details, offers, and service options based on their profile, eligibility, and usage patterns. Include intuitive navigation, quick links to frequent transactions, and real-time account balance widgets for a modern user experience.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Build workflows enabling customers to open new accounts and modify services online.
epics.description: Implement request-driven processes for account creation, updates, and service modifications. Ensure minimal clicks through pre-filled forms, guided steps, and streamlined approval processes. Integrate workflow automation tools to validate, route, and process customer requests efficiently.

epics.title: Real-Time Notifications and Request Status Tracking
epics.summary: Enable real-time alerts and tracking for customer requests and approvals.
epics.description: Provide customers with real-time visibility into the processing status of their submitted requests via an intuitive dashboard. Implement automated email and in-app notifications for significant updates, helping users stay informed about progress without visiting branches.

epics.title: Interaction History and Audit Tracking
epics.summary: Maintain detailed history for customer transactions and service requests.
epics.description: Develop a consolidated history view displaying all user interactions, submitted requests, and completed transactions. Implement audit trails capturing event timestamps, action details, and relevant approvals to ensure transparency and system accountability.

epics.title: Document Upload and File Management
epics.summary: Allow secure uploading and management of documents related to requests.
epics.description: Enable customers to upload necessary documents directly through the portal as part of their application or service modification workflows. Support common file formats with automatic virus scanning, encryption, and version control. Provide preview and download functionalities for convenience and compliance.

epics.title: Draft and Resume Incomplete Applications
epics.summary: Support saving and resuming partially completed applications.
epics.description: Allow customers to save incomplete forms or service requests and continue them later without losing data. Include autosave features, clear prompts for incomplete tasks, and reminders for resuming pending applications to improve user convenience and reduce abandonment rates.

epics.title: Responsive and Accessible Design
epics.summary: Ensure consistent user experience across devices with accessible design principles.
epics.description: Develop a responsive, mobile-friendly interface that maintains functional and visual consistency across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Implement accessibility standards for visually and physically impaired users, ensuring seamless interaction on any platform.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bankâ€™s core system for data and services.
epics.description: Establish secure, two-way integration between the self-service portal and the core banking system to ensure real-time data exchange and synchronization. Implement APIs or middleware that handle communication between systems, ensuring performance stability and data consistency.

epics.title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
epics.summary: Design and implement a database architecture optimized for portal operations.
epics.description: Develop an independent, high-performance database to manage portal-specific data such as session info, service requests, and customer documents. Optimize database performance through indexing, caching, and load balancing while ensuring regular backups, failover setups, and data recovery procedures.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
epics.summary: Implement user role management for secure access segregation and permissions.
epics.description: Create a flexible role-based access control framework to limit access to features and data based on user profiles, roles, and authorization levels. Ensure access rules are dynamically adjustable for customers, administrators, and support agents to maintain security and compliance.

user_stories.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to enable multi-factor authentication so that I can securely log in to the self-service portal.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include OTP, authentication apps, or email verification.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Multi-factor authentication setup should be available for customers.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they set up multi-factor authentication, then they should have options for OTP, authentication apps, or email verification.

user_stories.title: Secure Password Policies
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want secure password policies so that my account credentials are protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement complex password requirements and password expiration.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Password policies must enforce complexity and expiration.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they create a password, then the system should enforce complexity and expiration rules.

user_stories.title: Session Timeout Mechanism
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a session timeout mechanism so that my account remains secure when I am inactive.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Automatically log out after a period of inactivity.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Session timeout should automatically log the user out after inactivity.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they are inactive for a set period, then the system should automatically log them out.

user_stories.title: Data Encryption
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want my data to be encrypted so that my credentials are protected from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Encrypt sensitive data like passwords and user information.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Data should be encrypted both in transit and at rest.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they provide their credentials, then the data should be encrypted in transit and at rest.

user_stories.title: Dynamic User Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard so that I can view relevant banking products and information.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Display customer-specific details, offers, and service options.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should be personalized based on user profile and usage.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they log in, then the dashboard should display personalized information.

user_stories.title: Real-Time Account Balances
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to see real-time account balances so that I can monitor my financial status.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include real-time widgets for account balances.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Real-time account balances should be displayed on the dashboard.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they log in, then the dashboard should display real-time account balances.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Optimized Account Creation Process
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want an easy and quick account creation process so that I can open a new account with minimal effort.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Pre-filled forms and minimal clicks for account creation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The account creation process should be streamlined for minimal clicks.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they start creating an account, then the form should be pre-filled and require minimal clicks.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want an intuitive workflow for modifying my services so that I can easily update my options.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Guided steps and easy approval processes for service modifications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Service modification workflows should be user-friendly and efficient.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they modify a service, then the workflow should guide them through easy steps and approvals.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Workflow Automation
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want automated workflows so that my service requests are processed efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use workflow automation tools for validating and routing customer requests.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The automation should validate, route, and process requests efficiently.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they submit a request, then the workflow automation should handle validation, routing, and processing.

user_stories.epic_title: Real-Time Notifications and Request Status Tracking
user_stories.title: Real-Time Request Status Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to track my request status in real-time so that I can stay informed about the progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide an intuitive dashboard for real-time request tracking.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customers should view request status in real-time on their dashboard.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they check their request status, then the dashboard should display real-time updates.

user_stories.epic_title: Real-Time Notifications and Request Status Tracking
user_stories.title: Automated Notifications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to receive automated notifications for significant updates so that I can stay informed without visiting branches.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Send email and in-app notifications for updates.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Automated notifications should be sent for significant updates.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when there is a significant update, then they should receive an email or in-app notification.

user_stories.title: Consolidated History View
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to view my interaction history so that I can track my transactions and service requests.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Display detailed interaction history for transparency.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The history view should display all interactions in detail.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they view their history, then they should see all transactions and requests.

user_stories.title: Audit Trail Implementation
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want an audit trail for my activities so that there is accountability and transparency.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Capture event timestamps, action details, and approvals.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The system should maintain an accurate audit trail of all user activities.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they perform an action, then an audit trail entry should be created with timestamps and details.

user_stories.title: Secure Document Upload
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to upload documents securely so that my application is processed without security concerns.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support common file formats, virus scanning, and encryption.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customers should securely upload documents with virus scanning and encryption.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they upload a document, then it should be scanned, encrypted, and supported in common formats.

user_stories.title: Document Management Functions
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to preview and download uploaded documents so that I can verify them.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide preview and download functionalities.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Uploaded documents should be available for preview and download.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they upload a document, then they should be able to preview and download it.

user_stories.title: Save Incomplete Applications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to save my incomplete applications so that I can resume them later without losing data.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement autosave and clear prompts for incomplete tasks.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Incomplete applications should be saved without data loss, and users should see clear prompts to resume.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they save an incomplete application, then the data should be preserved, and they should be able to resume it later.

user_stories.title: Reminders for Pending Applications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want reminders for my pending applications so that I can complete them in a timely manner.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Send reminders for incomplete tasks.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customers should receive reminders for pending applications.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they have an incomplete application, then they should receive timely reminders to complete it.

user_stories.title: Responsive User Interface
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a responsive user interface so that I can have a consistent experience across all devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Maintain functional and visual consistency on desktops, tablets, and mobiles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The interface should be responsive across different devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they access the portal from different devices, then the UI should maintain consistency.

user_stories.title: Accessibility Standards
user_stories.description: As a customer with a disability, I want an accessible design so that I can use the portal seamlessly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement accessibility standards for impaired users.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal should meet accessibility standards for disabled users.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer with a disability, when they use the portal, then it should comply with accessibility standards.

user_stories.title: Two-Way Integration with Core System
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want real-time data synchronization so that my information is always current.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Establish secure integration for real-time data exchange.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Data should synchronize in real-time between the portal and the core banking system.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they perform transactions, then the data should be updated in real-time on both systems.

user_stories.title: Integration Middleware
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want stable performance when accessing services so that I can use the portal without issues.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement APIs or middleware for communication.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Middleware should handle stable communication between systems.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they use portal services, then the communication should be stable and consistent.

user_stories.epic_title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
user_stories.title: High-Performance Database Architecture
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want a dedicated database for the portal so that operations are efficient and reliable.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Design an optimized database with indexing, caching, and load balancing.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal should have a dedicated, high-performance database.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an administrator, when they manage the database, then it should perform efficiently and reliably.

user_stories.epic_title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
user_stories.title: Database Backup and Recovery
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want regular backups and recovery procedures so that data integrity is maintained.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure regular backups and failover setups.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The system should have regular backups and data recovery procedures.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an administrator, when they check backups, then the database should have recent backups available.

user_stories.title: Flexible Role Management
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to manage user roles and permissions so that access control is maintained securely.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Create and modify roles based on security and compliance needs.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The system should allow managing user roles and permissions flexibly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an administrator, when they manage roles, then they should be able to create and modify roles securely.

user_stories.title: Dynamic Access Rules
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to define dynamic access rules so that permissions are aligned with roles and responsibilities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Adjust access rules dynamically for different user profiles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Access rules should be dynamically adjustable based on roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an administrator, when they modify access rules, then the changes should apply based on user roles and profiles.
